Home

Add new task

  • Type task in the New Task textbox
  • Press add button to add task to the task list
  • Unfinished tasks count shown in the task header

Complete task

  • In the task list click on the check box to complete the task
  • Completed tasks will be displayed as strikeout text
  • Unfinished tasks count shown in the task header

Delete task

  • Select the task
  • An options menu will be displayed
  • Select trash icon to delete the task from the list

Settings

Change Theme

  • Navigate to the settings page from the sidebar
  • Select the available themes from the list to change the theme
